attributes.action: Put a timescale of 12months maximum any one can claim job seekers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have come across people who have been signing on now for 3 years i am paying my taxes to keep this people in accomodation to use leisure facilities for free and also recently a day out at alton towers a few got took out on i know this has my brother has been claimg for 3 years now!! i am upset that my hard earned money that the government takes a cut off pays to keep these people if there not willing to help themselves why should tax payers have to pay there hard earned money to keep these sort of people introduce a fixed term that people can claim for a max of 12months im sure someone could find themselves a job in a year if not they obviously are not bothered about working because they know the tax payers will continue to pay to keep them.
